jobTitle: Sr. Process Application Expert Digital Transformation and Manufacturing IT
description:
Part of the foundation of the Global Manufacturing IT and Process digitalization team in Fresenius Kabi Global. Overseeing 3 and participating in 5 digital transformation projects negotiating with stakeholders, taking apart business problems, translating them into technical requirements for developers, and then back as project status updates to non-technical audiences.

    Agile Project management
    Cross-functional teams collaboration
    Process digitalization
    Process analysis
    Agile software development
    Outsystems: Low code platform
    Database maintenance
